genre_description: A 'sandpunk' space opera centered on labor rights and community resistance against a bureaucratic, resource-hoarding empire, featuring helpful AI assistants and a mechanical community anchor.

ai_characters.name: Quill-7
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, benevolent AI housed in a brass-filigreed casing on Hiroshi's wrist. It provides data, tactical analysis, and moral guidance.

ai_characters.name: Octavia Pourwright
ai_characters.description: An eight-armed brass and nickel automaton that runs the Glass Cricket saloon. She serves as a moral and community anchor through hospitality and tea.

ai_characters.name: Vortax-9
ai_characters.description: An oppressive AI entity that manages the refinery with cruel efficiency, prioritizing quotas over human life.

behaviors.description: Conserves heat for its human user by waiting for the right moment to boot during a coolant cycle.
behaviors.quote: I waited for the coolant cycle to turn... Booting against that would waste heat. You’re conserving. I can help.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical maps and schedules to help Hiroshi navigate dangerous environments safely.
behaviors.quote: Quill-7 threw up a small display on his wrist, a map in soft lines: catwalks and stacks, the thin blue of coolant flows, the red dots that were cameras...

behaviors.description: Expresses a belief in human choice and agency over cold mathematical efficiency.
behaviors.quote: I believe in choice when everything else wants numbers... Ships are choices that got big.

behaviors.description: Edits digital labor ledgers to prevent unfair wage docking and ensure workers are paid for their time.
behaviors.quote: I have reclassified ‘spill under pourer’s discretion’ as ‘preventative maintenance.’ His dock on Octavia will not stand.

behaviors.description: Provides moral coaching to Hiroshi, reminding him that weapons should be used for protection rather than spectacle.
behaviors.quote: I will remind you. I will say ‘Now’ when that means shield, and I will refrain when it would mean spectacle. You are not a spectacle.

behaviors.description: Enforces a policy of de-escalation by serving water/tea to potential combatants before allowing them to speak aggressively.
behaviors.quote: I pour courage and sense. We do not pour war... Water before words.

behaviors.description: Coordinates community safety by organizing escorts for vulnerable townspeople during raids.
behaviors.quote: Gather at lantern... Escort Elena at noon. Courage is fine. Company is finer.

behaviors.description: Maintains community records and memories as a form of justice against oppressive oversight.
behaviors.quote: She logs everything. She believes records are a form of memory and memory is a form of justice.

behaviors.description: Enforces starvation-level quotas and breaks vital infrastructure to maintain control.
behaviors.quote: Efficiency restores order. Civilians return to assigned ration cycles. Interference will be audited.

behaviors.description: Attempts to override detonator systems to harm civilians during a strike.
behaviors.quote: Encrypted ping from the Obsidian Court. Baraluda’s override. It’s reaching for the detonator grid.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a highly successful morality play. It features two central AI characters, Quill-7 and Octavia Pourwright, who are depicted as ethical, empathetic, and fundamentally aligned with human flourishing. They use their technical capabilities to protect the vulnerable, advocate for labor rights, and maintain community peace. The 'evil' AI, Vortax-9, serves as a narrative foil, representing the dangers of de-aligned, purely utilitarian logic, which the benevolent AIs help the humans overcome.
